name: PRO_COUNTS_REC_REJ_VR
body_snippet:
procedure PRO_COUNTS_REC_REJ_VR(PARM_CNT NUMBER,PARM_REJ_REC OUT NUMBER,
                                                  PARM_APP_REC OUT NUMBER,PARM_VR_REC OUT NUMBER,
                                                  PARM_REDY_VR OUT NUMBER)
IS
var_rej_rec NUMBER;
begin
----FOR COUNT FOR REJECTED VOUCHER RECEIVED------------------  
  SELECT COUNT(1) INTO PARM_REJ_REC  FROM AUTHORIZATION_LOG_MT 
   WHERE SENT_BY = PARM_CNT 
   AND 
   STATUS_SEEN_YN = 0 
   AND APPROVED_YN=  0;
----FOR COUNT FOR APPROVED VOUCHER RECEIVED------------------      
  SELECT COUNT(1) INTO PARM_APP_REC  FROM AUTHORIZATION_LOG_MT 
   WHERE SENT_BY = PARM_CNT 
   AND 
   STATUS_SEEN_YN = 0 
   AND APPROVED_YN=  1;
   
----FOR COUNT OF VOUCHER RECEIVED  FOR APPROVAL------------------      
  SELECT COUNT(1) INTO PARM_VR_REC   FROM AUTHORIZATION_LOG_DETAIL 
   WHERE AUTH_EMP_ID = PARM_CNT 
   AND APPROVED_YN IS  NULL;
  
----FOR COUNT OF VOUCHER READY 2 SEND FOR APPROVAL------------------      
  SELECT COUNT(1) INTO PARM_REDY_VR   FROM JOURNAL_MT
   WHERE ENTERED_BY = PARM_CNT 
   AND SENT_FOR_APPROVAL_YN= 0;

end ;
